CustomField.description: This setting restores the 'Add Call Plan' button in Opportunity Manager. Otherwise, a link to the Call Planner application is shown in place of the button.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting restores the 'Add Call Plan' button in Opportunity Manager. Otherwise, a link to the Call Planner application is shown in place of the button.
CustomField.label: Enable OM Add Call Plan
